Reviews.Title: great seller and phone it is great condition....
Reviews.Author: M. Webb "mwebb"
Reviews.Content: this phone was is great shape.  took it to Verizon and they installed the SIM card for free while activating it.  now I have the same service with a new phone and still no contract.  Very, very happy!

Reviews.Title: new droid phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Shipped fast from Wirelessbliss without the extra cost. Though I wish that it was clearer about needing to have Verizon provide the Sim Card. That took a trip to the Verizon store.  They did so at no charge to me and even offered to insure the phone. Came with the stated accessories.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: got my phone in 5 days. got exactly what i ordered. phone is in perfect condition, brand new and works great. I simply love this phone!

Reviews.Title: Superior Customer Service!!!
Reviews.Author: Louann Crook "Doug & LouAnn Crook"
Reviews.Content: I accidently ordered the wrong phone.  Called them and they said no problem and sent out the phone I wanted same day.I would totally recommend them for any Cellular needs!!!!

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.  Kept my unlimited data plan for a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: Sherry R. Stroupe
Reviews.Content: I have a legacy unlimited data plan with my carrier, but they now prevent those of us with unlimited data to get a subsidized phone on contract renewal without being forced onto a tiered plan.  My Galaxy S3 had a cracked screen and I wanted to get back into a Motorola (I had a Droid X that I loved) so this RAZR HD worked out perfectly.  The SIM card from my S3 was easily swapped into my RAZR HD and I was using my contacts within minutes.  Thanks for offering this item!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: timothy scott davis
Reviews.Content: All around great phone. Awesome camera, great battery life and the battery saver tool keeps the phone going at least two days

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Kara Scharp
Reviews.Content: The phone was in good working condition. It shows minimal wear and tear on it.  The only complaint I have is the camera does not work as well as it should and the battery does not last as long as it should as well.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Ryan Finkbeiner
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my galaxy sIII. It works great and I've had no issues. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Ann Blevins
Reviews.Content: It was a waste of the money we spent. Nothing but problems with the phone. Upset more than I was happy trying to use it. Got to where even a hassle to try and make a call or text. Battery constantly dead. Had to stay hooked to a charger at all times. We will never buy a refurbished phone, it was trash.

Reviews.Title: Screen was detached
Reviews.Author: sand1015
Reviews.Content: I received a defective phone. I removed the protective plastic covering, and noticed some excess glue along the side and top of the phone.  When I went to remove it the screen was detached from the main part

Reviews.Title: Droid Razor
Reviews.Author: Ed J.
Reviews.Content: This was a direct replacement of the one I broke . My only complaint is for some reason the new phone did not have the same battery life I became accustomed to with the first one.

Reviews.Title: Had this and best phone I have owned to Dante
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Leblanc
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 5s now but previously owned this and read a review below about poor quality.....and "stickers rubbing off" -- I guess if you want to keep the stickers on, that's a real bummer. This is a KEVLAR back and CORNING Gorilla Glass Screen with a battery life that lasted 2 days with fairly use.

Reviews.Title: Seemed like a good phone...
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Mullett
Reviews.Content: So far, one of the trim pieces fell off, and I've only had the phone a couple of weeks. The tags on the back of the phone are rubbing off. I'm getting a bad feeling about the quality of the phone. My past Motorola phones didn't seem this cheap. I like the features, and the size as well as the screen visibility.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Motorola Droid RAZR HD is an amazingly thin, Android smartphone with 24-hour battery life
This update to the original Droid RAZR improves the display by offering a 4.7-inch HD Super AMOLED screen, while also increasing battery size, processor, and adding NFC
Featuring a dual-core 1.5 GHz processor and 1GB RAM, this smartphone is ready to multitask games, photos, music, videos, apps and more seamlessly
The Droid RAZR HD is also equipped with 4G LTE data, WiFi, 16GB internal storage, and quadband GSM and WCDMA modes for international use
This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Droid RAZR HD XT926 16GB LTE 4G White - Verizon Wireless
